title: [The Long Snow, Encampment]
description: Beneath a dark sky lit only by the ripples of a vast, shifting aurora, the small encampment huddles on a hill of windswept ice.  Sharp icicles drip from a long hitching post, around which cold-bitten reindeer, mules, and yaks congregate in shared misery.  Higher up on the hill, a vast bonfire holds the unrelenting frost at bay, but only barely.  It blazes, whipped to a wild fury by the screaming winds, in a pit dug before an oiled hide ger mounted at the hill's flat summit.
